title: Death Parties (w/ Andy Fiori, Rich Vos & Mike Finoia)
description: Andy Fiori & Rich Vos join the show & help recap the Oscars. A KTLA news anchor dies in a sex and drugs filled party for two. After watching Cops on TV, Jay is convinced that no female cop could arrest him & while Lost at Sea, Jay, Dan and Mike Finoia discuss the idea of a death party
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
content:encoded: Andy Fiori & Rich Vos join the show & help recap the Oscars. A KTLA news anchor dies in a sex and drugs filled party for two. After watching Cops on TV, Jay is convinced that no female cop could arrest him & while Lost at Sea, Jay, Dan and Mike Finoia discuss the idea of a death party
